name: PlutusFi
description: Plutusfi is a social trading application designed to empower cryptocurrency trading communities by providing social trading convenience services through a B2B2C model, with the following products, 1. Plutus NEXT, as easy as chatting to discover and post quotes. 2. Plutus BOT, creating trading robots with just one click. 3. Plutus DAO, one stop solution to helping trading KOL develop their own trading community. PlutusFi is constructing a decentralized financial social platform and setting up the incentive mechanism for the financial community to join PlutusFi platform, and making full use of the “node” advantage of the Key Trading Leaders (KTLs) in the financial communities.
